message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product. I believe it would be incredibly valuable for you. I'm asking for $14,000.  What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am looking to keep my investment within $15,000. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $12,000?
Bob, I understand your desire to stay within budget.  While the product is worth significantly more than your offer, I'm willing to come down a bit. How about we meet in the middle at $13,000?
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Considering my budget constraints, could we possibly agree on $12,500 for the product?
